product_name: MilaniKeep It Full Maxxx Balmshell Plumping Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani's Keep It Full Maxxx Balmshell Plumping Lip Balm is intense pout maximization that meets next-level hydration in a cushiony soft shine balm.
details: DetailsFeaturesLoaded with lip-loving ingredients including nourishing mango butter, avocado, jojoba and camellia seed oils + hyaluronic filling spheres & plumping peptidesLip MAXXXimizing oversized doe-foot applicatorCruelty-FreeMade in the U.S.A.BenefitsUltra-nourishing, non-sticky formula volumizes lips in just 10 minutes with a soft shine finishInstant cooling and tingling sensation for results you can see and feelFan-fave oversized doe-foot applicator designed for an ultra-comfortable application & easy coverage with just one swipe.96% felt Balmshell increased lip volume & fullness to deliver a maximum plumping effect*100% felt Balmshell made lips appeared more hydrated*93% felt Balmshell allowed them to achieve dr. office worthy plumping without the needleItem 2610820How To UseApply directly to bare lips and wait 10 minutes for the ultimate plumping effect.Ingredients‭Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin)‬, ‭Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer‬, ‭Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate‬, ‭Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil‬, ‭Menthone Glycerin Acetal‬, ‭Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil‬, ‭Ethylhexyl Palmitate‬, ‭Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38‬, ‭Camellia Japonica Seed Oil‬, ‭Tocopheryl Acetate‬, ‭Capsicum Frutescens Resin‬, ‭Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1‬, ‭Sodium Hyaluronate‬, ‭Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, ‭Portulaca Pilosa Extract‬, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, ‭Tribehenin‬, ‭Sorbitan Isostearate‬, ‭Lactic Acid‬, ‭Collagen‬, ‭Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter‬, ‭Flavor/Aroma‬, ‭Linalool‬, ‭Limonene‬, ‭Sucrose Cocoate‬, ‭Alcohol‬, ‭Water‬ / Aqua / Eau, ‭Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate‬, ‭Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer‬, ‭Glyceryl Oleate‬, ‭Silica Dimethyl Silylate‬, ‭Butylene Glycol‬, ‭Caprylyl Glycol‬, ‭Hexylene Glycol‬, ‭Phenoxyethanol‬, Barium Sulfate, Rosin / Colophonium / Colophane, ‭Red 7 Lake (CI 15850‬).
how_to_use: Apply directly to bare lips and wait 10 minutes for the ultimate plumping effect.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I do not see the difference with the "plump" but I love it. Is not sticky like others.

reviews.headline: Disappointed; Will Return
reviews.comments: I bought this because I love Luminoso, especially the lip gloss and lip oil. This is so pretty in the tube, but it made my lips feel uncomfortable and had huge chunks of glitter in it.

reviews.headline: For the girlies who know
reviews.comments: Yes, it plums , it adds volume and yes it does give a tingle to the lips. It's more intense than others but well worth it and the texture is my favorite! It's not Goopy and sticky like other plumpers.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
Not good
reviews.comments: It doesn't work as it should, I don't recommend it.

reviews.headline: Perfect lip plumper!
reviews.comments: I like my lip plumpers to BURN on my lips. This does just that!! It also adds nice color and glossiness to my lips. So much product for the price too! 100% reccomend

reviews.headline: Super nice for the price!
reviews.comments: Very clear with little to no tint to it but has a very faint watermelon smell/taste. The "plumping" sensation only lasts about from the time of application to a good 1 hour after, which honestly isn't bad for a drugstore plumper! I love, love, love the feel of this on my lips. It feels very cooling and sooooo smooth, it isn't thick and gross like how some plumping glosses are! You can def wear it alone or put it on before doing your makeup for a cute pout. I'd 100% recommend!

reviews.headline: Destroys my mouth
reviews.comments: I'm a lip plumper user. I love the Too Faced ones and use the Buxom lip glosses on a daily basis. This one is just ok in terms of plumping the lips. It works alright and doesn't burn too badly, but if this gets into my mouth, which is pretty much inevitable since it's on my lips, it really feels like it burns my tongue. Like, if I drink wine within a few days of wearing this it feels like my tongue is raw. It doesn't feel safe or smart to use a lip product that irritates your mouth.

reviews.headline: Nice Texture
reviews.comments: Thick gel like texture, plumps with mild irritation, medium shine. Feels alot like Buxom Plump Shot for $26. I will be this one for now on instead of Buxom's plumo shot.

reviews.headline: Great Lip Plumping gloss/ balm
reviews.comments: Has a great texture which im super funny about my gloss/ lip products. I have the high end brands so trying this I knew not to have high hopes. I was wrong!!! I love thecway it feels both on the lips and application. It feels like fancy lip oil/ lip sleep mask. I genuinely dont like gloss cause they're thick and gets stuck on the mouth and crust up normally. This i couldn't wait to apply more. Bect ill wear with my favorite lip liner. Livevtge tingle sensation.

reviews.headline: Don't do it
reviews.comments: Yall this products is a lip plumper and a max lip plumper so of course its goung to tingle but this is not a tingle this is straight up painful and hurts even after wiping it right way

reviews.headline: Not much plumping
reviews.comments: Feels minty and not painful. I like how cushiony it is and it is not sticky. I think for the lip balm aspect, it is good. But I don't notice much if any plumping effect. If it were a stronger product then I would probably repurchase it.

reviews.headline: my fav
reviews.comments: love this one! it does tingle a bit, but not as bad as the too faced one. plumps, moisturizes, and exfoliates. has a really nice smell and isn't sticky

reviews.headline: It's a No For Me
reviews.comments: I am usually a fan of the Milani lip glosses but this one was especially uncomfortable. The color was really nice and glossy and read my lips look classy but the plumping effect was way too intense and borderline uncomfortable. I took this off immediately. I don't really need a pumping affect to my lips, I have pretty juicy lips already, so it was not worth the discomfort. I couldn't even really leave this on long enough for it to work because of the stinging.

reviews.headline: Too Faced Dupe!
reviews.comments: This is my first review and it's all because I adore this product. This feels and even slightly smells like the Too Faced Lip Injection plumper except for a third of the price. Milani products are usually a hit for me and this one is an absolute home run.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: This a really smooth and non sticky gloss. It doesn't really plump my lips much but I will still purchase again just because of the moisture it provides without being tacky.

reviews.headline: 10/10 just get it
reviews.comments: This rivials Soap And Glory lip plumpers that I can't find anywhere? My new favorite. The scent is nice and it's not sticky at all. Just glossy and spicy and plumping! Please do not get rid of this :')

media.headline: Maxxx lip plumper
media.caption: It makes your lips plump and you can feel it working.

media.headline: Lovely lips!
media.caption: Half with this balm looks fuller. (Left side)

media.headline: Lip plumper
media.caption: Using Milani lip liner and lip plumper lip gloss.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love my lip plumping balm it's amazing. I love Milani cosmetics they make some amazing products. This keep it full maxxx balmshell lip plumping balm is awesome. It's a really good size lip balm that will last a good while too. I love the way it's so easy to use and feels so soft on my lips. It definitely gives me some fuller lips and they are just so plump; I love it. It's easy to use, glides right on my lips I love that it hydrates my lips and just makes them look and feel fuller. It has a nice, delicious scent of mango butter, vitamin E and a blend of oils in it that just really smells amazing but also hydrates and moisturize your lips. You definitely get that tingle feeling when you apply it, but I think it's working its magic to make your lips fuller and plump. I would highly recommend this product its fantastic and I absolutely love it!
faceoff_positive.headline: plump lips

faceoff_negative.comments: This product made my lips burn and seriously hurt me.  It took about 20 minutes for the burning to go away.
faceoff_negative.headline: Burning lips

rollup.name: Keep It Full Maxxx Balmshell Plumping Lip Balm
